The International Interdisciplinary Colloquium for Sustainable Communities'
research invites students from all partner universities to present the investigation
of their Master's and Ph.D. thesis (exceptionally also Bachelor's) in the field of
the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), especially climate, energy, and land
use, income generation and the Nexus of these. All should contribute to achieving
applied solutions for sustainable communities.

The colloquium is offered by the African Higher Education and NGO network
Greening Africa Together with the TU Berlin and other partners from Benin,
Burkina Faso, Cameroon, DR Congo, Germany, Ghana, Kenya,
Senegal, Spain, Togo, Turkey, Uganda, and Yemen.
